goal.en: “The main purpose of this course is to train students to have the ability to develop a database management system. This course includes theory and project implementation. The theoretical part will focus on the basic concepts of database management, including database models, entity association diagram design, data table normalization, SQL structured query language, and advanced database technology discussions. The implementation of the project will be based on the realization of the database theory, and practical implementation of the case will be carried out. Basic security issues for databases are also addressed.“
goal.ch: 本課程的主要目的為訓練同學具有開發資料庫管理系統的能力。本課程包含理論與專案實作。理論部份將著重在資料庫管理的基本概念，包括資料庫模型、實體關聯圖設計、資料表正規化、SQL 結構化查詢語言以及進階的資料庫技術探討等。專案實作將以實現資料庫理論為主，並以模擬實務的案子進行實作，過程同時融入基礎資料庫資安議題與操作。

content.en:
1 (2/17) Course Introduction
2 (2/24) Database Systems
3 (3/3) Data Models
4 (3/10) The Relational Database Model
5 (3/17) Entity Relational (ER) Modeling ＆ Advanced Data Modeling
6 (3/24) Normalization of Database Tables ＆ Relational Algebra
7 (3/31) Structured Query Language (SQL) ＆ Advanced SQL
8 (4/7) 期中成績評量
9 (4/14) 期中成績評量
10 (4/21) Database Design
11 (4/28) Database Administration
12 (5/5) Stored Procedures I
13 (5/12) Stored Procedures II
14 ( 5/19) Database Implementation I
15 (5/26) Database Implementation II
16 (6/2) SQL injection and hashing
17 (6/9) 期末成績評量
18 (6/16) 期末成績評量
